content.question: Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses"> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mi>t</mi> </mfenced> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 sin open parentheses pi over 2 t close parentheses"><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="3 sin open parentheses pi t close parentheses"><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="sin open parentheses pi over 2 t close parentheses plus 3"><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math>
<math alttext="sin open parentheses pi t close parentheses plus 3"><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 sin open parentheses pi over 2 t close parentheses"><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
